Below are the visualisations that are available for {{vm.analysisData.name}}


Categories

Categorise your content into a 5-level taxonomy. The top three categories will be returned.

View the complete list of categories here.

Supported languages: English

Basic Table


Concepts

Recognise high-level concepts that are related to your text. For example, analysis of a research paper about deep learning would likely return the concept "Artificial Intelligence", even if that term is not explicitly mentioned in the paper.

Supported languages: English, Spanish

Bubble Chart Basic Table


Entities

Identify people, cities, organisations, and many other types of entities in your text.

View the complete list of entity types and subtypes here.

Supported languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish

Radar Chart Basic Table


Keywords

Identify the important keywords in your content.

Supported languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish

Bubble Chart Radar Chart Treemap Chart Basic Table


Relations

Recognise when two entities are related, and identify the type of relation. For example, an "awardedTo" relation might connect the entities "Nobel Prize" and "Albert Einstein".

Supported languages: Arabic, English, Spanish

Basic Table


Semantic Roles

Parse sentences into subject, action, and object form.

Supported languages: English, Spanish
